Claim: "Young men are dumping soil onto the ground."
Implication: "The young men are lazing about on the beach."
Referring expressions: Young men, soil, ground  Young men, beach
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsDumping(a) and IsSoil(b) and IsGround(c))))) -> (exists a (exists d (IsLazing(a) and IsOnBeach(d))))
